data.name: THE AFRICAN ASSEMBLY FOR LINGUISTIC ANTHROPOLOGY 2021
data.location: Institute of Anthropology, Gender and African Studies, The University of Nairobi, Kenya, Nairobi
data.description: The African Assembly on Linguistic Anthropology, The AFALA 2021, in Bintulu, Sarawak, symbolizes a significant movement forward for Linguistic Anthropology, from the first highly successfully attended AFALA, to further problematize current perspectives and praxis in the field.
